remarks: Alternate deduction version of ~ ovmpt2 , suitable for iteration. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ovmpt2df.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. C ) $.
ovmpt2df.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B e. D ) $.
ovmpt2df.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = A /\ y = B ) ) -> R e. V ) $.
ovmpt2df.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = A /\ y = B ) ) -> ( ( A F B ) = R -> ps ) ) $.
ovmpt2dv $p |- ( ph -> ( F = ( x e. C , y e. D |-> R ) -> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps x y $.
